bike.description: Reynolds 631 seamless air-hardened chromoly main tubes with SST tubing diameters, double-tapered heat-treated cromo stays, extended head tube with reinforced collars, custom laser cut road disc dropouts with double eyelets and spoke carrier

components.description: Lugged semi-sloping chromoly with low-rider braze-ons, disc brake tab, forged dropouts with double eyelet
Mavic A119 double wall rims with CNC sidewalls, 36H, Shimano R505 Center Lock disc hubs and DT Champion 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur Pro with Double Shield puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c, folding
Shimano 105 RD-5700GS rear and Shimano 105 FD-5703 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
Avid BB-7 mechanical disc brake with Shimano 160mm rotors and Tektro RL340 road brake levers
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) 3D cold forged aluminum stem, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (47/50), 100mm (53/55), 120mm (57/59/62). ATS shim length 80mm
Ritchey Comp Road, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seatpin
Jamis Touring Sport with pressure relief cut-out and hollow chromoly rails
Full coverage fenders with adjustable stays and new designed mud flaps, Jamis carrier (capacity 25kg/55lbs.) with Jamis logo strap and rear reflector
